1:
My heart is fixed, God;\q I will sing, yes, I will sing praises also with my honored heart.
\q
2:
Wake up, lute and harp;\q I will wake up the dawn.


\q
3:
I will give thanks to you, Yahweh, among the peoples;\q I will sing praises to you among the nations.
\q
4:
For your covenant faithfulness is great above the heavens;\q and your trustworthiness reaches to the skies.


\q
5:
Be exalted, God, above the heavens,\q and may your glory be exalted over all the earth.
\q
6:
So that those you love may be rescued,\q rescue us with your right hand and answer me.


\q
7:
God has spoken in his holiness; "I will rejoice;\q I will divide Shechem and apportion out the Valley of Succoth.
\q
10:
Who will bring me into the strong city?\q Who will lead me to Edom?"


\q
11:
God, have you not rejected us?\q You do not go into battle with our army.
\q
12:
Give us help against the enemy,\q for man's help is futile.
\q
13: We will triumph with God's help;\q he will trample down our enemies.
